resources.string: Fill all fields in order to calculate which fuel is better
No fuel was specified using the \"selectâ€¦\" buttons\nSo a generic Fuel 1 and Fuel 2 will be used, respectively, for calculations
Using ethanol is better\nIn this case refueling with ethanol will be about %s%% more efficient
Using gasoline is better\nIn this case refueling with gasoline will be about %s%% more efficient
Using Fuel 1 is better\nIn this case refueling with Fuel 1 will be about %s%% more efficient
Using Fuel 2 is better\ntIn this case refueling with Fuel 2 will be about %s%% more efficient
The difference on efficiency of the fuels is about 0%, so there will be no relevant difference on savings
